name: Verreum
biography: Verreum was founded in 2009 by Pavel Weiser. The name verreum comes from a combination of two words: verre (glass in French) and "um" (craftsmanship in Czech). Verreum focuses on traditional glassmaking techniques and has revived the technique of silvered glass production. Verreum makes small decorative items including vases, bowls, lamps and candlesticks. In 2014, German product designer Sebastian Herkner became the company's art director.
